en.title: Front-End Developer
en.description: • Web application development using JavaScript frameworks Vue.Js or React.js for creating single-page applications and Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS frameworks for responsive Front-End applications and mobile-rst websites </br>• REST APIs integration </br>• Integration of payment methods such as Stripe </br>• Utilization of 3D tools like Three.js </br>• Development of both client-side and server-side websites </br>• Created several projects in the hospitality management eld, implementing user interfaces for managing statistics, employees, expenses, rooms, hotel chains, inventory, and AI-driven price suggestions </br>• Developed a tool for creating social media content with AI assistance </br>• Some experience with C# for developing console applications </br>• Helped in the maintenance of some websites in PHP
